languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Сервиторы{/g} перед вами словно исполняют сложный и малопонятный танец: приняв странные позы, они покачиваются на месте с причудливо изогнутыми руками. При вашем приближении один из сервиторов дергается и пытается повернуться в вашем направлении. Остальные тут же повторяют это движение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Сервиторы перед вами словно исполняют сложный и малопонятный танец: приняв странные позы, они покачиваются на месте с причудливо изогнутыми руками. При вашем приближении один из сервиторов судорожно дергается, словно пытается повернуться в вашем направлении. Остальные, словно молчаливые тени, повторяют это движение.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} before you appear as if they are performing some elaborate and confusing dance — striking strange poses, they rock back and forth with their arms bent at peculiar angles. Upon your approach, one of the servitors jerks and tries to turn in your direction. The rest immediately repeat the motion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Сервиторы{/g} перед вами словно исполняют сложный и малопонятный танец: приняв странные позы, они покачиваются на месте с причудливо изогнутыми руками. При вашем приближении один из сервиторов дергается и пытается повернуться в вашем направлении. Остальные тут же повторяют это движение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Servitors before you almost appear to be in the middle of performing some elaborate and confusing dance — in strange poses, they rock back and forth with their hands bent in a peculiar fashion. Upon your approach, one of the Servitors jerks frantically, as if trying to turn in your direction. The rest, like silent shadows, repeat the motion.{/n}

{n}The Servitors before you almost appear to be in the middle of performing some elaborate and confusing dance — in strange poses, they rock back and forth with their hands bent in a peculiar fashion. Upon your approach, one of the Servitors jerks frantically, as if trying to turn in your direction. The rest, like silent shadows, repeat the motion.{/n}

Upon your approach, one of the servitors jerks trying to turn in your direction. The rest immediately repeat the motion.{/n}

Upon your approach, one of the servitors jerks trying to turn in your direction. The rest immediately repeat the motion.{/n}

Upon your approach, one of the servitors jerks and tries to turn in your direction. The rest immediately repeat the motion.{/n}

{n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} before you appear as if they are performing some elaborate and confusing dance — striking strange poses, they rock back and forth with their arms bent at peculiar angles. Upon your approach, one of the servitors jerks and tries to turn in your direction. The rest immediately repeat the motion.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你面前的这些{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}机仆{/g}仿佛在表演某种精心设计的混乱舞蹈。他们摆出古怪的姿势，身体不断地来回摇晃，手臂也弯成了奇异的角度。当你靠近时，其中一位机仆抽搐着，试图转向你来的方向。其余的机仆见状，立刻模仿起了这个动作。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} before you appear as if they are performing some elaborate and confusing dance — striking strange poses, they rock back and forth with their arms bent at peculiar angles. Upon your approach, one of the servitors jerks and tries to turn in your direction. The rest immediately repeat the motion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你面前的这些{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}奴工{/g}仿佛在表演某种精心设计的混乱舞蹈。他们摆出古怪的姿势，身体不断地来回摇晃，手臂也弯成了奇异的角度。当你靠近时，其中一位奴工抽搐着，试图转向你来的方向。其余的奴工见状，立刻模仿起了这个动作。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidores{/g} que tienes delante parecen estar practicando un complejo y extraño baile. Adoptan poses extrañas y se mecen con los brazos inclinados en ángulos peculiares. Al acercarte, uno de los servidores da un respingo y se intenta girar hacia ti. Los otros lo imitan al momento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} before you appear as if they are performing some elaborate and confusing dance — striking strange poses, they rock back and forth with their arms bent at peculiar angles. Upon your approach, one of the servitors jerks and tries to turn in your direction. The rest immediately repeat the motion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidores{/g} que tienes delante parecen estar practicando un complejo y extraño baile. Adoptan poses extrañas y se mecen con los brazos inclinados en ángulos peculiares. Al acercarte, uno de los servidores da un respingo y se intenta girar hacia ti. Los otros lo imitan al momento.{/n}

languages.text: {n}目の前の{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}達は、まるで複雑でややこしいダンスを踊っているかのように奇妙なポーズをとり、腕をおかしな角度に曲げて前後に揺れている。近づいてみると、サーヴィターのひとりがギギギ…とこちらに視線を向ける。残りもすぐに同じ動きを繰り返す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} before you appear as if they are performing some elaborate and confusing dance — striking strange poses, they rock back and forth with their arms bent at peculiar angles. Upon your approach, one of the servitors jerks and tries to turn in your direction. The rest immediately repeat the motion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}目の前の{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}達は、まるで複雑でややこしいダンスを踊っているかのように奇妙なポーズをとり、腕をおかしな角度に曲げて前後に揺れている。近づいてみると、サーヴィターのひとりがギギギ…とこちらに視線を向ける。残りもすぐに同じ動きを繰り返す。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitoren{/g} vor dir scheinen einen komplexen und verwirrenden Tanz aufzuführen – sie nehmen merkwürdige Posen ein und rudern mit ihren Armen, die sie seltsam abwinkeln, vor und zurück. Als du dich näherst, zuckt einer der Servitoren zusammen und versucht, sich zu dir umzudrehen. Der Rest imitiert die Bewegung sofort.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} before you appear as if they are performing some elaborate and confusing dance — striking strange poses, they rock back and forth with their arms bent at peculiar angles. Upon your approach, one of the servitors jerks and tries to turn in your direction. The rest immediately repeat the motion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitoren{/g} vor dir scheinen einen komplexen und verwirrenden Tanz aufzuführen – sie nehmen merkwürdige Posen ein und rudern mit ihren Armen, die sie seltsam abwinkeln, vor und zurück. Als du dich näherst, zuckt einer der Servitoren zusammen und versucht, sich zu dir umzudrehen. Der Rest imitiert die Bewegung sofort.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} qui se tiennent devant vous paraissent exécuter une danse aussi complexe que déroutante faite de poses étranges et de balancements de bras pliés à des angles inhabituels. À votre approche, l'un d'entre eux sursaute et tente de se tourner vers vous. Et les autres font immédiatement de même.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} before you appear as if they are performing some elaborate and confusing dance — striking strange poses, they rock back and forth with their arms bent at peculiar angles. Upon your approach, one of the servitors jerks and tries to turn in your direction. The rest immediately repeat the motion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} qui se tiennent devant vous paraissent exécuter une danse aussi complexe que déroutante faite de poses étranges et de balancements de bras pliés à des angles inhabituels. À votre approche, l'un d'entre eux sursaute et tente de se tourner vers vous. Et les autres font immédiatement de même.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Karşındaki {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}hizmetörler{/g}, girift ve çetrefilli bir dans sergiliyormuş gibi tuhaf pozlar veriyor. Hizmetörlerin kolları, tuhaf açılarda bükülmüş bir şekilde ileri geri sallanıyor. Hizmetörlerden biri, yaklaştığında silkinip sana doğru dönmeye çalışıyor. Kalanı da hemen hareketi tekrarlamaya çalışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitors{/g} before you appear as if they are performing some elaborate and confusing dance — striking strange poses, they rock back and forth with their arms bent at peculiar angles. Upon your approach, one of the servitors jerks and tries to turn in your direction. The rest immediately repeat the motion.{/n}
